com.zhonghu.sip.pjsip

类 PjSipCalls

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhonghu.sip.pjsip.PjSipCalls

  • public final class PjSipCalls
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class to manage pjsip calls. It allows to convert retrieve pjsip calls information and convert that into objects that can be easily managed on Android side

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String dumpCallInfo(int callId)
      Get infos for this pjsip call
      static void updateSessionFromPj(SipCallSessionImpl session, pjsip_event e, Context context)
      Update the call session infos

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • updateSessionFromPj

        public static void updateSessionFromPj(SipCallSessionImpl session,
                                       pjsip_event e,
                                       Context context)
                                throws SameThreadException
        Update the call session infos
        参数:
        session - The session to update (input/output). Must have a correct call id set
        service - PjSipService Sip service to retrieve pjsip accounts infos
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • dumpCallInfo

        public static java.lang.String dumpCallInfo(int callId)
                                     throws SameThreadException
        Get infos for this pjsip call
        参数:
        callId - pjsip call id
        返回:
        Serialized information about this call
        抛出:
        SameThreadException
